group_1.narration: Maria Yuki@Request: Can you help me exterminate a Witch?@                  Please do it by the end of today...!

group_1.textCenter: Oh...! The three of you must be@the Azalea Sisters, yes?

group_1.textRight: Yup, that's us!

group_1.textLeft: No, wait, hold on a sec...@How'd you know that name...?

group_1.textRight: Well...it was written in the reply to my request...

group_1.textLeft: [chara:302800:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Heh heh! Ain't it a great name?

group_1.textRight: Hey, Konoha... Did you give her permission to@use that name...?

group_1.textLeft: No... I'm upset, too. I never expected@other people to hear it...

group_1.textRight: Well, this is our first time properly meeting@each other.
My name is Maria Yuki.
You are...Konoha, is that correct?
Then you must be Hazuki, and the littlest one is...
That's right, you're Ayame.
Thank you for accepting my request today.

group_1.textLeft: I can take out a Witch in no time,@just watch me!

group_1.textRight: *Giggle* My, how reliable.
You're a very impressive girl, Ayame,@fighting Witches with your older sisters...

group_1.textLeft: It's nothin', we're all Magical Girls!

group_1.textRight: ...That's right.
I suppose age no longer matters once you're@a Magical Girl...
...I'm sorry to trouble you right away, but@I'm going to show you where the Witch is.
Please follow me...!

group_1.textLeft: Hey, Maria, are we almost there yet?

group_1.textRight: Yes, it's just a little further.
You run quite fast, so we'll get there sooner@than I thought.

group_1.textLeft: ...Maria, you're a member of the Union, correct?
Is there anyone besides us helping you@exterminate the Witch?

group_1.textRight: I usually have help, but I couldn't find anyone@who was available today...
I ventured into the Labyrinth alone, but...
The Witch is so fast that I can't hunt it by myself...

group_1.textLeft: Well, the sooner we get rid of the Witch, the better,@but couldn't you have waited until tomorrow?

group_1.textRight: The Labyrinth is near the preschool@where I volunteer.
That's why we need to get rid of the Witch@as soon as possible.
I can't allow the children to be exposed to danger.

group_1.textLeft: If that's the case, then as bodyguards,@we'll have to do our job well.

group_1.textRight: Yup, don't worry, Maria. We'll defeat the Witch.
Thank you... I'm counting on you...!
